title: Impress the Murder Tribunal
content:
to become more powerful.

Impress the Murder Tribunal Objectives

Kill to gain access to the Bhaalist Murder Tribunal

An unnerving stranger gave us a list of people and asked us to kill from it. If we do so, and bring a severed hand as proof, we can stand before the Murder Tribunal and enter the Temple of Bhaal. We found a list of people marked for death. If we kill two targets from this list, and bring a severed hand as proof, we can stand before the Murder Tribunal and enter the Temple of Bha
